alert.note: Alert for Carlton, South St. Louis; Central St. Louis (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Duluth (Northeast Minnesota and Northern Wisconsin)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued December 16 at 1:52PM CST by NWS Duluth
info.description: ...AN AREA OF HEAVY SNOW SHOWERS WILL AFFECT SOUTHERN ST. LOUIS AND NORTHWESTERN CARLTON COUNTIES... At 150 PM CST, an area of heavy snow showers were along a line extending from near Fond Du Lac Band Brookston Area, to 7 miles south of Whiteface Reservoir, and moving southwest at 15 mph. Expect visibility to fall to near one quarter of a mile in heavy snow. Roads will become snow covered. Locations impacted include... Cloquet, Floodwood, Cotton, Cromwell, Brookston, Meadowlands, Boulder Lake, Saginaw, Fond Du Lac Band Brookston Area, Island Lake, Whiteface Reservoir, Fond Du Lac Band Sawyer Area, Canyon, Fond Du Lac Band Cloquet Area, Grand Lake, Fredenberg, Mahnomen, Alborn, Culver, and Wright. Use extra caution if you must travel. Rapid changes in visibility and potentially slick roads are likely.

area.areaDesc: Carlton, South St. Louis; Central St. Louis
